name: Latal
description:
Solve tasks in this puzzle game with time as your only enemy - and your only ally.

Learn to deal with reverse time and with temporal inverted elements and controls, and always keep in mind: where you are now will be soon where you have been!

Basic controls:

  • W/A/S/D - move
  • Spacebar - jump
  • R/F - activate tools
  • N - restart level
  • U - toggle music on/off
  • Esc - quit to main menu
